010package imagingbook.common.util;
011
012import java.util.Arrays;
013import java.util.Iterator;
014
015/**
016 * This class defines static methods for creating array iterators.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 * @version 2022/11/20
020 */
021public abstract class ArrayIterator {
022        
023        private ArrayIterator() {}
024        
025        // https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10335662/convert-java-array-to-iterable.
026        /**
027         * Returns an iterator for the specified (non-primitive) array.
028         * The resulting iterator does not implement {@link Iterator#remove()}.
029         * 
030         * @param <T> the generic element type
031         * @param array a non-primitive array 
032         * @return the associated iterator
033         */
034        public static <T> Iterator<T> from(T[] array) {
035                return Arrays.stream(array).iterator();
036        }
037
038}
